contents_summary: Mathematical framework for computing similarity and attraction between cognitive/spatial states. Establishes resonance calculus methodology.
Foundational treatise establishing basin topology as framework for understanding attractor dynamics. Introduces basin metaphor.
Prediction framework using topological structure to forecast future states. Claims 91% historical accuracy.
14+ entries documenting tracking of Yeller creature. Includes 'The Incident' (entry 007) and Vellmarsh Years (entry 013).
notes: Dannkit's Additions (entry 014) appended posthumously. Primary Yeller documentation.

contents_summary: Creature behavior prediction system. Documents 'creature grammar' and behavioral patterns including prime-number cycles.
notes: Folk rules achieve 61% prediction accuracy per compiler's notes.

contents_summary: Creature activity observations organized by season. Practical guide for Quarry crews.
notes: Updated periodically by Quarry crews. Practical rather than scholarly.

contents_summary: List of dangerous sites that should not be visited or mapped. Locations deliberately omitted from standard maps.
notes: Do not duplicate. Do not excerpt.

contents_summary: Protocols for mapping plural beings like Yeller. Special handling for five-in-one entities.
notes: See also Grigsu's Notebooks for Yeller behavior.

contents_summary: Hazard reporting form. Standard template for documenting dangerous encounters.
notes: Blank forms available. Filed reports restricted.

contents_summary: First manuscript acquired at Archive founding. Contents obscured by age.
Six principles for Dens mapping. Boundary Impermanence; Non-Accumulation; Observer Influence; Coordinate Mortality; Selective Blindness; Sufficient Vagueness.
Formal debate between Vornis Keth and Archon Prebel. Topic: breach vs continuous transition between states.
notes: Historical document. Demonstrates schism in spatial philosophy.

contents_summary: Breathing phenomenon in attractor basins. Rhythmic expansion and contraction of cognitive territories.
Addresses stability-plasticity dilemma: how systems maintain identity while adapting.
Constellation Method for spatial clustering. Tension fields in graph structures.
notes: Never met Keth despite related work.

contents_summary: Universal morphospace of possible forms. 'Bodies as readers' metaphor.
TAME hierarchy: Triggered Autonomous Modular Emergent. I-C-integral formula for mind classification.
Trust economics between parts and wholes. How collective intelligence negotiates.
Exponential decay curves for memory and haunting. Mathematical framework for fading.
How forms manifest into material existence. Theory of ingression mechanics.
Field observations compiled under Yeller Protocols. Raw data from plural being encounters.
Documentation for manuscript authentication system. Uncertainty scoring methodology.
Six domains of failure. Systematic classification of how systems break down.
Four dimensions of care. Central thesis: 'Care folds time.'
Signal and substrate theory. How patterns operate across different material bases.
Studies on synthetic beings and artificial creation. Experimental documentation.
Same substrate computes differently for different observers. Polycomputing framework.
Pattern inheritance theory. How forms persist across generations.
Collection of maps belonging to Colonel's daughter. Personal possession.
notes: Reference entry only. Archive seeks acquisition.
